body_html:
Thanks for response, @zou3519. But if isDifferentiable blocked cause fo no implement, then the code in line 325-340

} else if (node->matches("aten::cat(Tensor[] tensors, int dim) -> Tensor", /*const_inputs=*/attr::dim)) {
...

will never run and seems it is exactly the difference of aten::cat.

For now I can not sure wether it could work (In re-compiling), or you can just tell me line 325-340 are still in building so that I can save the time. 😉
body:
Thanks for response, @zou3519. But if `isDifferentiable` blocked cause fo no implement, then the code in line 325-340 
```C++
} else if (node->matches("aten::cat(Tensor[] tensors, int dim) -> Tensor", /*const_inputs=*/attr::dim)) {
...
```
will never run and seems it is exactly the difference of `aten::cat`.

For now I can not sure wether it could work (In re-compiling), or you can just tell me line 325-340 are still in building so that I can save the time. 😉
